router_module_error_api_login_username_p.message: Maximum login attempts reached. Please try again later.

router_unknown_error_logging_in.message: Failed to login to router. Make sure the username and password are correct.

connection_error.message: Cannot connect to the router at $URL$. Please make sure you are connected to the network. If the problem persists, make sure the router URL($URL$) is correct in the extension's settings.

invalid_router_url_error.message: Invalid router URL; $1. Please set a valid URL in the extensions's options.

empty_router_url_error.message: Router URL is empty. Please set a valid URL in the extension's options.

home_admin_only.message: Cannot view data usage while offline

sms_admin_only.message: You must have administrator access to view SMS messages.

sms_action_select_dropdown_types_group.description: Label given to the SMS types group in the dropdown used to select SMS messages.

sms_first_to_last.description: Shows which sms messages are currently being displayed.

sms_first_to_last_of_total.description: Shows which sms messages are currently being displayed including the total.

sms_empty.description: Displayed when there are no messages

sms_edit_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the sms message edit button

sms_dialog_field_numbers_placeholder.description: Placeholder value for sms dialog numbers field

sms_dialog_character_count.message: Number of characters in this message.

sms_dialog_character_count_max.message: The maximum number of characters per message.

sms_dialog_segment_help.message: SMS messages are split up into multiple segments of $LONG_MAX$ characters if they exceed $NORMAL_MAX$ characters.
sms_dialog_segment_help.description: Explains how SMS concatenation works to the user.

sms_dialog_remaining_characters_in_segme.message: The number of characters remaining in this segment.

sms_dialog_message_count.message: The number of segments this message will be split up into. In most cases, you will be billed for each segment.

sms_mark_read_partial_error.message: Error: Could only mark $SUCCESSFUL$/$TOTAL$ message(s) as read
sms_mark_read_partial_error.description: Shown when there is an eror marking sms as read

sms_delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete $COUNT$ message(s)?

sms_import_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to import $COUNT$ message(s) from the SIM card?

sms_import_warning_not_enough_space.message: There is only enough space to import $AVAILABLE$ message(s) out of $COUNT$. Would you like to import anyways?

sms_import_error_not_enough_space.message: Not enough space to import messages.

sms_import_complete.message: Imported $SUCCESS$ message(s) successfully. Failed to import $FAIL$ message(s).

sms_save_not_enough_space.message: Not enough space to save message.

sms_box_full.message: Your message box is full. To receive new messages, delete some existing ones.
sms_box_full.description: Shown to the user when their message box is full.

sms_read.description: Shown when an sms message has been read

sms_unread.description: Shown when an sms message has not been read

services_admin_only.message: You must be in administrator mode to access USSD services.

options_labels_general_routerUrl.description: Router URL field on the extensions options page.

options_labels_general_username.description: Username field on the extension options page.

options_labels_general_password.description: Password field on the extension options page.

options_button_save.description: Save button on the extension options page.

options_error_ping.description: Error message displayed when a connection to the router URL can't be established. Used on the extension options page.

options_descriptions_general_defaultMode.message: The mode that is the default when you first open Quantum router

options_descriptions_general_rememberLog.message: Whether Quantum should save your login details

options_descriptions_sms_hideSimBoxes.message: Whether SIM boxes (inbox, sent and draft) should be shown

options_descriptions_sms_confirmDialogsT.message: Actions which will show confirmation dialogs before execution

options_descriptions_sms_typeIcons.message: The icons to use for different message types

validation_tag_input_number.description: Error message shown when a non-number is inputted in a tag input where only numbers are allowed.

validation_tag_input_required.description: Error message shown when a tag input is required and was left blank.

settings_admin_only.message: You must be in administrator mode to change settings.

icon_picker_button.description: Text on the button for opening icon pickers

icon_picker_title.description: Title for the icon picker modal
